entry.title: 14"x108" Dusty Rose Rustic Burlap Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 7.19 - 327.09 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Runner
Material: High quality Jute/Burlap
Color: Dusty Rose
Size: 14" wide x 108" length
Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable.
This is not a defect and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Introducing the Jute/Burlap runner that is sure to exude a classy taste while definitely blending in alongside the beautiful country look. Made with sturdy fabric and styled for a charming appeal, make sure to buy a few these for those outdoor bonding moments.

This High-Quality linen has been studied and refined after the rare Chambury House linen masterpieces because when everything just has to be perfect, then perfection begins with Chambury Casa linens!

Additional Information:

  • The smell can dissipate some by leaving in open air, but may still be noticeable. Please keep this in mind when ordering.
  • How to Care: Dry clean only
  • For table runner only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

entry.title: 36" x 100ft All Natural Jute Burlap Aisle Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3900
Type: Decorations
Price: 76.99

[About]

Material: Authentic Jute Burlap
Color: Natural
Length: 100 Feet
Width: 36 Inches
Pull Cord: Not Included
Perfect for both indoor and outdoor uses.
Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Walk down the aisle of your indoor or outdoor wedding like a paradise princess with grace and style on our heavy duty Jute wedding Aisle runner. This stylish and sturdy runner is made from high quality all natural burlap. Exuding rustic elegance of natural jute, this Wedding Aisle Runner will transform any plain aisle or floor to a bucolic beauty.

Our Jute  aisle runner is an ideal and budget-friendly choice for giving fanciful final touches to your indoor or outdoor wedding ceremony, award ceremony, bridal shower, and other special events. Whether you wish to grant a rustic charm to your beach wedding, garden wedding, or indoor wedding, the bride will look absolutely angelic as she makes her way down the aisle on this gorgeous aisle runner.

High quality and heavy duty burlap construction makes this runner robust enough to withstand coarse conditions while taut and stiff jute material will stay wrinkle free for safe walking. For a perfectly personalized exotic feel, scatter our satin rose petals in the color of your party theme on this aisle runner, arrange the petals along either side of the aisle runner or surround the area where the bride and groom will stand to make their final vows! These aisle runners will not only add interest and instant visual appeal to your wedding photos, but will also protect your wedding gown from stains and ripping.

Simple yet Elegant choice for Your Grand Walk, Down-The-Aisle.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Authentic Jute Burlap
  • Color: Natural
  • Length: 100 Feet
  • Width: 36 Inches
  • Pull Cord: Not Included
  • Perfect for both indoor and outdoor uses.
  • Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable.
  • This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material.
  • The smell can dissipate some by leaving in open air, but may still be noticeable. Please keep this in mind when ordering.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
entry.s:tag: cat-sub1_Fine Rustic Jute Burlap Table Runners
categ-Fine Rustic Jute Burlap Table Runners
